PORT.description: Port for the Express server to listen on

CLIENT_ORIGIN.description: Allowed CORS origins - Add your Vercel domain(s) here

SUPABASE_URL.note: Get this from Supabase Dashboard → Settings → API

SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY.note: Get this from Supabase Dashboard → Settings → API → service_role key

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token signing
JWT_SECRET.note: Use a strong random string (at least 32 characters)

SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP server for email (optional, for password reset)

SMTP_PASSWORD.note: For Gmail, use App Password, not regular password

railway.instructions: Add these as environment variables in Railway dashboard

render.instructions: Add these in Render dashboard → Environment section
render.buildCommand: cd server && npm install && npm run build
